mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Excerpts from 1978 Department of Public Welfare Publication Challenge

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A copy of the January-February 1978 issue of the Department of Public Welfare's Challenge magazine. This issue includes sections that discuss Community Living Arrangements, Family Resource Services, Early Intervention, and Vocational Rehabilitation.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records

mods:relatedItem.mods:note: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records, 1953-2000, MSS 1002 , Detre Library and Archives, Senator John Heinz History Center
